TextView.android:text: Jobder is a virtual Employment System for all fields and skills of work. The application will try and overcome the employment barriers that numerous people are faced with. The main target group I hope to help are students, people with no qualifications and poor lexical skills. The application will consist of two modes: The Employer and the Employee. The Employee is responsible for filling in his/her details. The Employee’s main features will consist of creating/editing their profile, viewing their conversations and swapping jobs if in search.
